meanings.definition: A person who tidies or cleans up a space.
meanings.sent1: The tidiers quickly organized the messy room.
meanings.sent2: My mom is a great tidiers around the house.
meanings.sent3: The tidiers found a lost sock while cleaning.
meanings.sent4: She was like a superhero, swooping in to save the day like a tidiers.
meanings.sent5: The tidiers worked diligently to make the space spotless.

meanings.definition: Comparative form of tidy, meaning more tidy or organized.
meanings.sent1: Her room was tidiers than mine after she cleaned it.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen looked much tidiers after the renovation.
meanings.sent3: The cat made a mess, but the room looked tidiers after she cleaned up.
meanings.sent4: The garden was tidiers than a picture after she finished planting flowers.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was tidiers than ever with the new colorful decorations.
